name: Squick
description:
This is Squick's game.

He like to go on adventures .

There are 5 levels:

1) Hello world - you go and explore, to win you have to reach the chest.

2) Be careful - there are some blocks you can step on and blocks you can't.

3) Just do it - you jump down and it depends on your luck.

 4) Trick - The hardest level in the game or....

5) Finally - Who can complete this is the pro platformer.

This game is fun to play and speedrun. This is also my first game that I made in 1 week, so please don't judge hard.

It’s best to play on tablets on iPads or phones with big screen 

Have a nice time.
